apiInfo.title: FF 1ONLYSARKAR SHOP API Documentation
apiInfo.description: Complete API documentation for FF 1ONLYSARKAR SHOP - Your trusted source for Free Fire emotes and premium services

categories.name: Emotes
categories.description: Endpoints for managing and sending emotes

endpoints.name: Get All Emotes
endpoints.description: Retrieves a list of all available emotes. Supports optional limit parameter for pagination.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of emotes to return

endpoints.name: Send Emote
endpoints.description: Sends an emote to a Free Fire account. Includes rate limiting, daily limits for free users, and premium bypass.

fields.name: uid
fields.description: Free Fire User ID (5-20 characters, numeric only)

responses.example: {"error": "Access Denied", "blocked": true, "blockMessage": "Your account has been blocked"}

categories.name: User Status
categories.description: Check whitelist, blocklist, and daily usage status

endpoints.name: Check Whitelist Status
endpoints.description: Check if a UID is whitelisted (has premium access)

endpoints.name: Check Blocklist Status
endpoints.description: Check if a UID is blocked from using the service

endpoints.name: Get Daily Usage Stats
endpoints.description: Get daily usage statistics for a UID

categories.name: Settings & Configuration
categories.description: Get public site settings and configurations

endpoints.name: Get Site Settings
endpoints.description: Retrieves public site settings including navigation and footer configuration

endpoints.name: Get Footer Configuration
endpoints.description: Get public footer configuration including company info, sections, and social links

endpoints.name: Get Custom Pages
endpoints.description: Get published custom pages. Optionally get a specific page by slug.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: Page slug to retrieve specific page

responses.description: Custom pages list or single page

categories.name: Payments (Razorpay)
categories.description: Payment processing endpoints for premium subscriptions

endpoints.name: Get Available Plans
endpoints.description: Get all available premium subscription plans

endpoints.name: Create Payment Order
endpoints.description: Create a new Razorpay order for premium subscription. Includes rate limiting and duplicate order prevention.

fields.name: planId
fields.description: ID of the plan to purchase

fields.name: uid
fields.description: Free Fire UID to whitelist (5-20 numeric characters)

responses.description: Invalid input or UID already has premium
responses.example: {"error": "This UID already has premium access until ..."}
{"error": "Too many payment attempts. Please wait before trying again."}

endpoints.name: Create Payment Link
endpoints.description: Create a Razorpay payment link for premium subscription

endpoints.name: Verify Payment
endpoints.description: Verify payment signature and activate premium subscription. Uses cryptographic signature verification.

responses.example: {"success": true, "message": "UID xxx has been whitelisted for Monthly Premium", "expiresAt": 1735689600000}

endpoints.name: Check Payment Status
endpoints.description: Check status of a payment link payment

fields.name: sessionToken
fields.description: Session token from payment link creation

endpoints.name: Razorpay Webhook
endpoints.description: Webhook endpoint for Razorpay payment notifications. Handles payment.captured, payment.failed, and order.paid events.

endpoints.name: Admin Login
endpoints.description: Authenticate as admin. Returns 2FA requirement if enabled.

endpoints.name: Check Admin Status
endpoints.description: Check if current session is authenticated as admin

endpoints.name: Generate 2FA Secret
endpoints.description: Generate new 2FA secret and QR code for setup

endpoints.name: Enable 2FA
endpoints.description: Verify and enable 2FA with secret and token

endpoints.name: Get Dashboard Statistics
endpoints.description: Get comprehensive dashboard statistics including emote logs, payments, and user counts

endpoints.name: Get All Emotes (Admin)
endpoints.description: Get paginated list of emotes with search capability

endpoints.name: Add Emote
endpoints.description: Add a single emote or bulk import emotes

fields.name: bulk
fields.description: Array of {id, url} objects for bulk import

categories.name: Admin Whitelist & Blocklist
categories.description: Manage premium users and blocked UIDs

endpoints.name: Get Whitelist & Settings
endpoints.description: Get all whitelisted UIDs, blocked UIDs, and rate limit settings

endpoints.name: Manage Whitelist
endpoints.description: Add, remove, or extend whitelist entries. Also manage blocked UIDs and rate limits.

fields.name: action
fields.description: Action: add, remove, extend, cleanup, setCooldown, setDailyLimit, addBlocked, removeBlocked, updateBlocked

fields.name: uid
fields.description: User ID (for add, remove, extend, block actions)

fields.name: additionalSeconds
fields.description: Seconds to extend or cooldown value

endpoints.name: Manage Plans
endpoints.description: Add, update, or delete premium plans

fields.name: plan
fields.description: Plan object with id, name, duration, price, currency

endpoints.name: Get Single Custom Page
endpoints.description: Get a specific custom page by ID

endpoints.name: Update System Config
endpoints.description: Update system configuration including admin credentials

endpoints.name: Update Developer Settings
endpoints.description: Update custom code injection (HTML, CSS, JS)

categories.name: Admin Logs & Audit
categories.description: View system logs and audit trails

endpoints.name: Export Backup
endpoints.description: Download complete system backup as JSON file
